title: Pixel 2. Screen dead; Restart or Safe Mode not an option
content:
My wifes pixel 2 suddenly shows a dead screen (screen pixels colored differently like on an old TV if you know hat i mean). https://photos.app.goo.gl/TcAZixyPk1yJn1ZY7
The phone wasn't dropped. The Screen is not broken!
But she said it got very slow before that happend.

I can connect it to the laptop, Pixel 2 shows up at in Explorer, but of course i can't choose Data Transfer on the screen, so i can't backup all her important files/photos. (she didn't have "Back up & Save" activated)

Right now i'm completely out of ideas. 
Any Ideas what may help here? :/
